feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-11-18T19:54:54.578470Z; ; ; <作者>; <名称>;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;洛克希德现在正在从太空跟踪手机和对讲机</stitle>; <id>;https://jackpoulson.substack.com/p/lockheed-is-now-tracking-phones -和</id>; <更新>;2023-11-18T18:54:49.741228Z</更新>; <link href="https://jackpoulson.substack.com/p/lockheed-is-now-tracking-phones-和”/>; <author>; <name>;ed-209</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ed-209</uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws. com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Fe8319517-1174-497e-a2fb-486ecc0825ff_2048x1450.jpeg" style="width: 220px;高度：156px;" />;<br />;天基监视公司 HawkEye 360​​ 宣布与洛克希德·马丁公司合作，在全球范围内提供先进的射频情报系统。HawkEye 的卫星经过训练可以定位电磁发射，包括卫星电话、对讲机、蜂窝塔和 GPS。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#lockheed-is-now-tracking-phones-and-walkie-talkies-from-space" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38322966" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;伯克利单色字体</stitle>; <id>;https://berkeleygraphics.com/typefaces/berkeley-mono /</id>; <更新>;2023-11-18T18:54:49.743287Z</更新>; <link href="https://berkeleygraphics.com/typefaces/berkeley-mono/"/>; <作者>; <名称>; gjvc</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gjvc</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn. berkeleygraphics.com/static/images/marketing/intro.svg" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;Berkeley Mono 是一款受计算黄金时代启发的等宽字体。它结合了机器可读字体的客观性和人文无衬线品质。它专为阅读和编写代码而设计，具有出色的易读性和舒适的行高。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#berkeley-mono-typeface" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38322793" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;纳米塑料促进帕金森病</stitle>; <id>;https://corporate.dukehealth.org/news/nano Plastics-promote-conditions-parkinsons-across -各种实验室模型</id>; <更新>;2023-11-18T18:54:49.743710Z</更新>; <link href="https://corporate.dukehealth.org/news/nano Plastics-promote-conditions- Parkinsons-across-various-lab-models"/>; <作者>; <名称>;ulrischa</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ulrischa</uri>; </作者>; <内容类型=“html”>; <img src =“https://corporate.dukehealth.org/sites/default/files/2023-11/Plastic%20neuron.png”样式=“宽度：220px;高度：220px;" />;<br />;纳米塑料与大脑中的蛋白质相互作用，导致与帕金森病和痴呆症相关的变化。这项研究强调需要进一步研究环境因素对人类生物学的影响。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#nano Plastics-promote-conditions-for-parkinson" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=38322944" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;Frigate：具有实时 AI 对象检测功能的开源网络录像机</stitle>; <id>;https://frigate.video/</id>; <更新>;2023-11- 18T16:54:49.744139Z</updated>; <link href="https://frigate.video/"/>; <作者>; <name>;thunderbong</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=thunderbong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://frigate.video/images/ui.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 132px;" />;<br />;Frigate 是一款使用实时 AI 对象检测的开源 NVR。它在本地执行所有处理，不会将摄像头信号发送到云端。<a href="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/#frigate-open-source-network-video-recorder-with-real-time-ai-object-detection" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https ://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38321413" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;密码学家解决了数十年之久的隐私问题</stitle>; <id>;https://nautil.us/cryptographers-solve-decades-old-privacy-problem- 444899/</id>; <更新>;2023-11-18T15:54:49.744549Z</更新>; <link href="https://nautil.us/cryptographers-solve-decades-old-privacy-problem-444899/ "/>; <author>; <name>;Brajeshwar</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Brajeshwar</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://assets.nautil.us/sites/3/nautilus/OneQuestion-logo.png?auto=compress&fit=scale&fm=png&h=127&ixlib=php-3.3.1&w=300&wpsize=medium" style="width: 220 像素； height: 94px;" />;<br />;研究人员开发了一种隐私信息检索版本，允许用户从公共数据库访问信息，而无需透露他们访问过的内容。这一突破可能会带来真正的隐私搜索，用户可以匿名筛选数据，无需大量计算。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cryptographers-solve-decades-old-privacy-problem" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38320675" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;倒置钙钛矿太阳能电池打破了 25% 的效率记录</stitle>; <id>;https://news.northwestern.edu/stories/ 2023/11/perovskite-solar-cell-efficiency-record/</id>; <更新>;2023-11-18T18:54:49.744933Z</更新>; <link href="https://news.northwestern.edu/ Stories/2023/11/perovskite-solar-cell-efficiency-record/"/>; <author>; <name>;geox</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=geox</ uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://news.northwestern.edu/assets/Stories/2022/11/perovskites-aaron-demeter__FitMaxWzk3MCw2NTBd.jpg" style="width: 220 像素； height: 148px;" />;<br />;西北大学研究人员开发了一种双分子解决方案来提高钙钛矿太阳能电池的效率。通过解决表面复合和破坏层间界面的复合，该团队取得了经认证的效率25.1%，超越了之前的方法。该研究强调了关注界面对于进一步提高钙钛矿太阳能电池的效率和稳定性的重要性。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#inverted-perovskite-solar- cell-breaks-25-efficiency-record" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38322485" target="_blank">; [comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;星舰综合飞行测试 2中部时间上午 7 点</stitle>; <id>;https://www.spacex.com/launches/mission/?missionId=starship-flight-2</id>; <updated>;2023-11-18T10:54:49.745334 Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.spacex.com/launches/mission/?missionId=starship-flight-2"/>; <作者>; <name>;BenoitP</name>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=BenoitP</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.spacex.com/static/images/infographics /Splashdown_Infographic_Desktop.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 102px;" />;<br />;Dragon 进行一系列燃烧以接近国际空间站，然后完成对接机动、加压、舱口打开和乘员进入。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat .io/#starship-integrated-flight-test-2-at-7-am-central-time" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=38317247" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;Death by AI – 一款免费的 Jackbox 风格派对游戏。AI 判断你的生存计划</stitle>; <id>;https://deathbyai.gg</id>; <更新>;2023-11 -18T13:54:49.745714Z</updated>; <link href="https://deathbyai.gg"/>; <author>; <name>;overactor</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=overactor</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://joinplayroom.com/titles/og/dbai-og.png" style="width: 220px ; height: 116px;" />;<br />;走进一个人工智能掌握所有牌的世界。它会成为你的盟友，还是会拔掉插头？明智地选择，因为它没有被编程来关心！人工智能造成的死亡是一个基于提示的生存多人游戏，可在移动设备和网络上与您的朋友和家人一起玩。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#death-by-ai-a-free-jackbox-style-party-game -ai-judges-your-plans-to-survive" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38318889" target=" _blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;自动Postgres 的索引系统</stitle>; <id>;https://pganalyze.com/blog/automatic-indexing-system-postgres-pganalyze-indexing-engine</id>; <updated>;2023-11-18T16:54:49.746486 Z</updated>; <link href="https://pganalyze.com/blog/automatic-indexing-system-postgres-pganalyze-indexing-engine"/>; <作者>; <名称>;ako</名称>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ako</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://pganalyze.com/static/e901c916d712eb4e9053b87e78d9fcfd/1d69c/ pganalyze-indexing-engine.png" style="width: 220px; height: 231px;" />;<br />;pganalyze 索引引擎是一个人工智能辅助、开发人员驱动的系统，有助于解决现代查询工作负载索引的复杂性。它根据查询自动为数据库选择并推荐最佳索引分析和成本改进指标。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#an-automatic-indexing-system-for-postgres" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38300297" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;令人惊讶的董事会政变细节浮出水面，推翻了 OpenAI 首席执行官 Sam Altman</stitle>; <id>;https://arstechnica.com/information-technology /2023/11/report-sutskever-led-board-coup-at-openai-that-ousted-altman-over-ai-safety-concerns/</id>; <更新>;2023-11-18T16:54:49.746861Z </更新>; <link href="https://arstechnica.com/information-technology/2023/11/report-sutskever-led-board-coup-at-openai-that-ousted-altman-over-ai-safety -concerns/"/>; <author>; <name>;jncraton</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jncraton</uri>; </author>; <content type="html" >;<img src="https://cdn.arstechnica.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/sutskever_header_2-800x450.jpg" style="宽度：220px;高度：124px;" />;<br />;OpenAI 出人意料地解雇了首席执行官 Sam Altman，导致总裁 Greg Brockman 和三名资深科学家辞职。此次罢免很可能是由首席科学家 Ilya Sutskever 出于对安全和安全的担忧而精心策划的。 OpenAI 技术部署的速度。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#details-emerge-of-surprise-board-coup-that-ousted-ceo-sam-altman-at-openai" target= "_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38321003" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; < /entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Greg (2017)</stitle>; <id>;https://blog. samaltman.com/greg</id>; <更新>;2023-11-18T18:54:49.747601Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.samaltman.com/greg"/>; <作者>; <名称>;admp</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=admp</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Greg Brockman 被描述为理想的联合创始人，他提供推动创业的意志力。他快速、全身心地投入到事情中，招募创始团队，并在一开始就担任非技术角色。创始团队中有像格雷格这样的人对于成功至关重要。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#greg-2017" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=38322660" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;Show HN：用于创建 Duolingo 等课程的开源工具</stitle>; <id>;https://uneebee.com</id>; <updated>;2023-11-18T08:54:49.748774Z</已更新>; <link href="https://uneebee.com"/>; <作者>; <name>;ceolin</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ceolin</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://uneebee.com/_next/static/media/play.ff6cf2ea.png" style="width: 220px; height: 173px;" />;<br />;UneeBee 是 Duolingo 的开源白标替代品。轻松创建交互式课程来教授任何内容。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-open-source-tool-for-creating-courses-like-duolingo" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38316936" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;监控技术为警察撰写新闻稿；新闻机构正在发布它</stitle>; <id>;https://www.techdirt.com/2023/11/17/surveillance-tech-companies-are-writing-press-releases-for-cops-worse-news- Agency-are-publishing-them/</id>; <更新>;2023-11-18T17:54:49.749530Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.techdirt.com/2023/11/17/监视技术公司正在写作新闻发布-for-cops-worse-news-agencies-are-publishing-them/"/>; <author>; <name>;rntn</name>; <uri>;https:// /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rntn</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i0.wp.com/www.techdirt.com/wp -content/uploads/2023/11/Screenshot-2023-11-12-6.29.59-PM.png?resize=773%2C863&ssl=1" style="宽度：220px；高度：246px；" />;<br />;执法机构有允许其技术提供商撰写新闻稿的历史，在此过程中放弃了自主权。这种做法也适用于充当警方速记员的记者，他们发布新闻稿而不寻求其他观点。电子前沿基金会 (EFF) 批评新闻媒体为技术提供商发布伪装成新闻文章的广告。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#surveillance-tech-write-press-releases-for-cops-news-agcies-are-publishing-it" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;GTK：引入图形卸载</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.gtk.org/2023/11/15/introducing-graphics-offload/</id>; <更新>;2023-11-18T08:54:49.749902Z</更新>; <link href= “https://blog.gtk.org/2023/11/15/introducing-graphics-offload/”/>; <author>; <name>;signa11</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=signa11</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blog.gtk.org/files/2023/11/bbb-above.png" style= “宽度：220 像素；高度：283 像素；” />;<br />;GTK 团队的一些成员一直在探索 Linux 内核图形 API，特别是 dmabufs。他们在这一过程中经历过挫折，也经历过成功。该团队希望通过避免不必要的复制和利用 dmabufs 来优化像素数据的处理。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#gtk-introducing-graphics-offload" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=38316953" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;实用的 Go 零恐慌检测</stitle>; <id>;https://www.uber.com/en-NL/blog/nilaway-practical-nil-panic-detection-for- go/</id>; <更新>;2023-11-18T16:54:49.750293Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.uber.com/en-NL/blog/nilaway-practical-nil-恐慌检测-for-go/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;advanderveer </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=advanderveer</uri>; </作者>; <内容type="html">;不可接受<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#practical-nil-panic-detection-for-go" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38300425" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Google 正在将听不见的水印嵌入到其人工智能生成的音乐中</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theverge.com/2023/ 11/16/23963607/google-deepmind-synthid-audio-watermarks</id>; <更新>;2023-11-18T16:54:49.751049Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.theverge.com /2023/11/16/23963607/google-deepmind-synthid-audio-watermarks"/>; <author>; <name>;CharlesW</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=CharlesW </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.vox-cdn.com/thumbor/aTOFODAqx5LhTLoNA104sIjUFuc=/0x0:428x285/1200x628/filters:focal(214x143: 215x144)/cdn.vox-cdn.com/uploads/chorus_asset/file/25088828/unnamed__1_.jpg" style="宽度：220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;SynthID 将用于为 DeepMind Lyria 模型的音频添加水印，使人们能够识别 AI 生成的曲目。水印是人耳无法察觉的，可以承受压缩、速度变化，并添加噪音。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#google-is-embedding-inaudible-watermarks-into-its-ai- generated-music" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38321324" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Apple II 的第二现实</stitle>; <id>;http://deater.net/weave/vmwprod/second/< /id>; <更新>;2023-11-18T11:54:49.751444Z</更新>; <link href="http://deater.net/weave/vmwprod/second/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;EvanAnderson< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=EvanAnderson</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="http://deater.net/编织/vmwprod/second/sr_title.png" style="width: 220px; height: 180px;" />;<br />;Second Reality for Apple II 是对著名的 MS-DOS 演示的改版，其效果和图形突破了 Apple II 平台的极限。它赢得了复古演示类别的第一名在 Demosplash 2023 上。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#second-reality-for-apple-ii" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38283359" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;电视：现在怎么办？</stitle>; <id>;https://commonsware.com/blog/2023/11/18/tv-now-what.html </id>; <更新>;2023-11-18T16:54:49.752623Z</更新>; <link href="https://commonsware.com/blog/2023/11/18/tv-now-what.html" />; <author>; <name>;ingve</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ingve</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src ="https://commonsware.com/Jetpack/cover_small.png" style="宽度：220px； height: 285px;" />;<br />;据报道，亚马逊计划将 Fire TV 从 Android 转移到他们自己的基于 Linux 的操作系统上。电视应用程序开发将在 React Native 中完成。这一转变为企业家提供了一个机会为电视平台进行开发。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#tv-now-what" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38321371" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：Etcha – 无限扩展、无服务器配置管理</stitle>; <id>;https://etcha.dev</id>; <更新>;2023-11-18T15 :54:49.753020Z</updated>; <link href="https://etcha.dev"/>; <作者>; <name>;candiddevmike</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=candiddevmike</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://etcha.dev/etcha.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;文章讨论了名为 Etcha 的无服务器配置管理工具的使用。强调了其无限扩展的能力以及与 Kubernetes 的兼容性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat .io/#show-hn-etcha-infinite-scale-serverless-config-management" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=38320707" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;更多人应该写作（2012）</stitle>; <id>;https://jsomers.net/blog/more-people-should-write</id>; <更新>;2023-11-18T09:54 :49.753401Z</updated>; <link href="https://jsomers.net/blog/more-people-should-write"/>; <作者>; <name>;jsomers</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jsomers</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://jsomers.net/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/ 09/photo.jpg" style="宽度: 220px; height: 144px;" />;<br />;更多的人应该写作，因为它改变了你的生活方式，让你生活得更加好奇。写作可以帮助你更深入地接触世界，一切对你来说都更有意义。<a href ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#more-people-should-write-2012" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com /item?id=38284852" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;现实的模式</stitle>; <id>;https://aeon.co/essays/more-than-argument-logic-is-the-very-struct-of-reality</ id>; <更新>;2023-11-18T16:54:49.753776Z</更新>; <link href="https://aeon.co/essays/more-than-argument-logic-is-the-very-struct- of-reality"/>; <author>; <name>;prismatic</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=prismatic</uri>; </author>; <content type="html" >;<img src="https://images.aeonmedia.co/user_image_upload/2715/Oliver-Byrne-The-First-Six-Book-of-the-Elements-of-Euclid-Londres-1847-Book-I- prop.png?width=3840&quality=75&format=auto" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;逻辑对于我们检测不一致并将不同信息组合在一起的能力至关重要。它使我们能够从前提推理到结论并解决复杂问题。逻辑的历史与此交织在一起数学的基础，因为数学依赖于逻辑推理。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-patterns-of-reality" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38294941" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;如果钱过期了怎么办？</stitle>; <id>;https://www.noemamag.com/what-if-money-expired/< /id>; <更新>;2023-11-18T16:54:49.754150Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.noemamag.com/what-if-money-expired/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;rlnorthcutt</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rlnorthcutt</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// noemamag.imgix.net/2023/11/Noema-Magazine-What-If-Money-Expired-Final-300DPI.jpg?fit=crop&fm=pjpg&h=1186&ixlib=php-3.3.1&w=947&wpsize=noema-portrait-hero-图片&s=485e9a0b6fbc4cef47f0ab0b0f0d7b1d"样式="宽度：220px； height: 276px;" />;<br />;一位长期被遗忘的德国经济学家提出了易腐烂货币的想法，认为这会改善社会和经济。他的想法受到了当时主要经济学家的拥护，包括约翰·梅纳德·凯恩斯。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#what-if-money-expired" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=38294275" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
